pages.text: HUAJI particles have significant application value; however, the elemental form is highly inert and has little direct use. Its special properties only truly manifest after being blended with other materials.
Leveraging the power of the Nether Star, this instrument can blend HUAJI with other materials, thereby activating the Kichiku elements within and transforming them into various HUAJI materials.
pages.title: HUAJI Perfusion
